mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO connection (student, teacher, step, subject, studentMatch, registeredAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{teacherId}, 'REQUEST', #{subjectId}, #{studentMatchId, javaType=int, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
SELECT CONNECTION_SEQ.currval FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT c.id connectionId, c.step step, s.name student, sub.name subject FROM connection c JOIN teacher t ON t.id = #{teacherId} AND t.id = c.teacher JOIN subject sub ON sub.id = c.subject JOIN student s ON s.id = c.student where c.step = 'CLASS'

SELECT c.id connectionId, c.step step, t.name teacher, sub.name subject FROM connection c JOIN student s ON s.id = #{studentId} AND s.id = c.student JOIN subject sub ON sub.id = c.subject JOIN teacher t ON t.id = c.teacher where c.step = 'CLASS'

SELECT c.id connectionId, c.step step, s.name student, sub.name subject FROM connection c JOIN teacher t ON t.id = #{teacherId} AND t.id = c.teacher JOIN subject sub ON sub.id = c.subject JOIN student s ON s.id = c.student

SELECT c.id connectionId, c.step step, t.name teacher, sub.name subject FROM connection c JOIN student s ON s.id = #{studentId} AND s.id = c.student JOIN subject sub ON sub.id = c.subject JOIN teacher t ON t.id = c.teacher

SELECT c.id id, c.step step, s.id "studentId", s.name "studentName", s.phone "studentPhone", sub.id "subId", sub.name "subName", sub.category "subCategory", si.id "studentInfoId", si.studentgender "studentGender", si.schooltype "schoolType", si.status "schoolStatus", si.schoolcategory "schoolCategory", si.grade "schoolGrade", si.profileimg "profileImg", sch.id "schoolId", sch.name "schoolName", sm.id "studentMatchId", sm.ability "matchAbility", sm.teachergender "teacherGender", sm.memo "matchMemo", sm.grade "matchGrade", sm.testresult "testResult", str.answer "testAnswer", stp.question "testPaperQuestion", stp.answer "testPaperAnswer", stp.ability "testPaperAbility", st.id "timeId", st.time "time", d.id "dongId", d.name "dongName", chr.id "charId", chr.name "charName", chr.description "charDesc" FROM connection c JOIN student s ON c.id = #{connectionId} AND s.id = c.student JOIN studentInfo si ON si.student = s.id JOIN school sch ON sch.id = si.school LEFT JOIN studentMatch sm ON c.studentmatch = sm.id LEFT JOIN studentTestResult str ON str.studentmatch = sm.id LEFT JOIN subjectTestPaper stp ON str.testpaper = stp.id LEFT JOIN studentTimes st ON st.studentmatch = sm.id LEFT JOIN studentRegion sr ON sr.studentmatch = sm.id LEFT JOIN dong d ON d.id = sr.dong LEFT JOIN studentCharacter sc ON sc.studentmatch = sm.id LEFT JOIN character chr ON chr.id = sc.character JOIN subject sub ON sub.id = c.subject

SELECT c.id "connectionId", c.step "step", t.id "teacher.id", t.name "teacher.name", t.phone "teacher.phone", ti.profileImg "teacherInfo.profileImg", ti.teacherGender "teacherInfo.teacherGender", ti.entranceyear "teacherInfo.entranceYear", ti.status "teacherInfo.status", u.id "teacherInfo.university.id", u.name "teacherInfo.university.name", m.id "teacherInfo.major.id", m.name "teacherInfo.major.name" FROM connection c JOIN teacher t ON c.id = #{connectionId} AND c.teacher = t.id JOIN teacherInfo ti ON ti.teacher = t.id JOIN subject s ON s.id = c.subject JOIN university u ON u.id = ti.university JOIN major m ON m.id = ti.major
